name: Combat Racers
description: A hectic, fast-paced car combat game for up to four players. Drive your own customized car to outmaneuver and outgun your opponents. Quick reactions are essential as one wrong move can be the difference between winning and becoming a smoking wreck.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Intel core i-3 or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 Dedicated GPU - 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 Dedicated GPU - 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 600 MB available space
